00074 std::ostream & SockRecord::Print(std::ostream &rhs) const {
00075   rhs << "SockRecord(connection=" << connection
00076       << ", bin=" << bin
00077     //      << ", bout=" << bout
00078       << ", status="
00079       << (status==FREE ? "FREE" :
00080           status==UNBOUND ? "UNBOUND" :
00081           status==BOUND ? "BOUND" :
00082           status==LISTENING ? "LISTENING" :
00083           status==ACCEPT_PENDING ? "ACCEPT_PENDING" :
00084           status==CONNECT_PENDING ? "CONNECT_PENDING" :
00085           status==CONNECTED ? "CONNECTED" :
00086           status==READ_PENDING ? "READ_PENDING" :
00087           status==WRITE_PENDING ? "WRITE_PENDING" :
00088           "UNKNOWN")
00089       << ", toApp=" << toApp
00090       << ", fromApp=" << fromApp
00091       << ", blocking=" << blocking
00092       << ")";
00093   return rhs;
00094 }

00097 SockStatus::SockStatus(const SockStatus &rhs) {
00098   int i;
00099   for (i = 0; i < NUM_SOCKS; i++)
00100     sockArray[i] = rhs.sockArray[i];
00101 }

00112 int SockStatus::FindFreeSock() {
00113   int i;
00114   for (i = 1; i < NUM_SOCKS; i++)
00115     if (sockArray[i].status == FREE)
00116       break;
00117   if (i < NUM_SOCKS)
00118     return i;
00119   return -1;
00120 }

00122 
00123 int SockStatus::FindConnection(const Connection & c) {
00124   int i;
00125   for (i = 1; i < NUM_SOCKS; i++)
00126     if (((c.src == sockArray[i].connection.src) &&
00127          (c.dest == sockArray[i].connection.dest) &&
00128          (c.srcport == sockArray[i].connection.srcport) &&
00129          (c.destport == sockArray[i].connection.destport) &&
00130          (c.protocol == sockArray[i].connection.protocol))
00131         ||
00132         ((c.src == sockArray[i].connection.src) &&
00133          (IP_ADDRESS_ANY == sockArray[i].connection.dest) &&
00134          (c.srcport == sockArray[i].connection.srcport) &&
00135          (PORT_ANY == sockArray[i].connection.destport) &&
00136          (c.protocol == sockArray[i].connection.protocol) &&
00137          (ACCEPT_PENDING == sockArray[i].status)))
00138       break;
00139   if (i < NUM_SOCKS)
00140     return i;
00141   return -1;
00142 }
00143 
00144 int SockStatus::FindPendingConnection(const Connection & c) {
00145   int i;
00146   for (i = 1; i < NUM_SOCKS; i++)
00147     if ((c.src == sockArray[i].connection.src) &&
00148         ((c.dest == sockArray[i].connection.dest) ||
00149          (sockArray[i].connection.dest == IP_ADDRESS_ANY)) &&
00150         (c.srcport == sockArray[i].connection.srcport) &&
00151         ((c.destport == sockArray[i].connection.destport) ||
00152          (sockArray[i].connection.destport == PORT_ANY)) &&
00153         (c.protocol == sockArray[i].connection.protocol) &&
00154         ((sockArray[i].status == CONNECT_PENDING) ||
00155          (sockArray[i].status == ACCEPT_PENDING)))
00156       break;
00157   if (i < NUM_SOCKS)
00158     return i;
00159   return -1;
00160 }

00163 int SockStatus::SetStatus (unsigned sock, Status stat) {
00164   if ((sock < 1) || (sock >= NUM_SOCKS))
00165     return -1;
00166   sockArray[sock].status = stat;
00167   return 0;
00168 }

00219 PortStatus::PortStatus() {
00220   int i, j;
00221   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++) {
00222     portArrayIndex[i] = IP_ADDRESS_ANY;
00223     for (j = 0; j < NUM_PORTS; j++)
00224       portArray[i][j] = 0;
00225   }
00226 }

00229 PortStatus::PortStatus(const PortStatus & rhs) {
00230   int i,j;
00231   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++) {
00232     portArrayIndex[i] = rhs.portArrayIndex[i];
00233     for (j = 0; j < NUM_PORTS; j++)
00234       portArray[i][j] = rhs.portArray[i][j];
00235   }
00236 }

00239 PortStatus & PortStatus::operator=(const PortStatus & rhs) {
00240   int i,j;
00241   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++) {
00242     portArrayIndex[i] = rhs.portArrayIndex[i];
00243     for (j = 0; j < NUM_PORTS; j++)
00244       portArray[i][j] = rhs.portArray[i][j];
00245   }

00248 
00249 int PortStatus::FindFreePort(IPAddress ip, unsigned sockfd) {
00250   int i, j;
00251   if (sockfd >= NUM_SOCKS)
00252     return -1;
00253   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++)
00254     if (portArrayIndex[i] == ip)
00255       break;
00256   if (i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES)
00257     for (j = 1; j < NUM_PORTS; j++)
00258       if (portArray[i][j] == 0) {
00259         portArray[i][j] = sockfd;
00260         return j;
00261       }
00262   return -1;
00263 }
00264 
00265 int PortStatus::Socket(IPAddress ip, unsigned port) {
00266   int i;
00267   if (port >= NUM_PORTS)
00268     return -1;
00269   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++)
00270     if (portArrayIndex[i] == ip)
00271       break;
00272   if (i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES)
00273     return(portArray[i][port]);
00274   return -1;
00275 }
00276 
00277 int PortStatus::AssignPort(IPAddress ip, unsigned port, unsigned sockfd) {
00278   int i;
00279   if ((port >= NUM_PORTS) || (port < 1) || (sockfd >= NUM_SOCKS))
00280     return -1;
00281   for (i = 0; i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES; i++)
00282     if (portArrayIndex[i] == ip)
00283       break;
00284   if ((i < NUM_IP_INTERFACES) && (portArray[i][port] == 0)) {
00285     portArray[i][port] = sockfd;
00286     return sockfd;
00287   }
00288   return -1;
00289 }

00342 
00343 Queue::~Queue() {
00344   QueueElt *t;
00345   while (front != NULL) {
00346     t = front;
00347     front = front->front;
00348     delete t;
00349   }
00350 }

00353 Queue & Queue::operator=(const Queue & rhs) {
00354   front = rhs.front;
00355   back = rhs.back;
00356   return *this;
00357 }

00359 
00360 void Queue::Insert(void * d) {
00361   QueueElt *q=new QueueElt;
00362   q->data = d;
00363   q->front = back;
00364   q->back = NULL;
00365   if (back != NULL)
00366     back->back = q;
00367   else
00368     front = q;
00369   back = q;
00370 }
00371 
00372 
00373 void * Queue::Remove() {
00374   if (front == NULL)
00375     return NULL;
00376   void * ret = front->data;
00377   QueueElt * d = front;
00378   front = front->back;
00379   if (front != NULL)
00380     front->front = NULL;
00381   else
00382     back = NULL;
00383   delete d;
00384   return ret;
00385 }
